citation: Proclamation under the Regional Forest Agreement (Land Classification) Act 1998 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Regional Forest Agreement (Land Classification) Act 1998

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(1) of the Regional Forest Agreement (Land Classification) Act 1998 fix 30 April 1999 as the day on which Division 3 of Part 2 of that Act and Schedules 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12 and 13 to that Act commence.

28 April 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 April 1999

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment.
